pages.text: $(li)The Moobloom is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cow$(/l) that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l) and $(l)Raw Beef$() upon death.$(br)$(li)They can't be tamed, but they can be breed and milked in the same way as the cows.
You can right click on a Moobloom while you are holding $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in you hand to transform it into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cow$(/l).
